div.p: Sub-tag within DATESTRUCT only. Needs narrowing down through Value attribute in order to fit into timeline.
Attribute Reg on Season: I believe redundant. So far as I know Season tag has been used to enclose only Spring, Summer, Autumn/Fall (we never need to reg one of these to the other), and Winter.

Attribute Value on Season: Convention with Season tag is to reckon (more European than Canadian!) December-Feb for winter, March-May for spring, June-August for summer, Sept-Nov for autumn, and to use Value of middle month of the season (Certainty=”C”) unless text says e.g. “early spring”. Use zeroes in these numbers to make two digits: 12 but 08 and 04.

div.codeblock: datestruct CERTAINTY C VALUE=”1351-04-”><season C VALUE=”04”>Spring</> <year CERTAINTY=”Cert” value 1351”>1351</></>
